<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Tooth Fairy](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3216)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Lone fairies usually need several minutes of elbow grease and a sleeping or restrained subject to extract a tooth.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Fey](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 13

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 8
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Tooth_Fairy.webp" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature -1">[Tooth Fairy](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3216)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tiny" />
<trait label="Fey" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=599" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 327 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +6; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**
[Fey](/Languages.aspx?ID=119)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +5, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +5, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** -2

**Dex** +3

**Con** +0

**Int** -1

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Items**
pliers

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 

**Fort** +2 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +4 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 8

</row>

**Weaknesses**
[cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2916) 2

**Plaque Burst** When killed, a tooth fairy bursts into sticky, foul-smelling white dust. Each creature in a 5-foot emanation must succeed at a DC 16 Fortitude save or become [sickened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=91) (sickened 2 on a critical failure).

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 10 feet, fly 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
pliers +7 ([Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [reach 0 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d6 bludgeoning plus Tooth Tug

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 13
- **Cantrips (1st)**
[Telekinetic Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=1715)
- **1st**
[Sleep](/Spells.aspx?ID=288)

**Tooth Tug** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Requirements** The tooth fairy's last action was a successful pliers Strike against a creature with teeth; **Effect** The tooth fairy attempts a [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=50) check against the creature's Fortitude DC, dealing 2 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) on any result but a critical failure. On a critical success, it also pulls out one of the target's teeth. If the creature loses a tooth, it takes a –1 status penalty to Charisma-based skill checks and must succeed at a DC 5 flat check to Cast a Spell unless that spell has the [subtle](/Traits.aspx?ID=522) trait. These effects last for 1 day, or until the stolen tooth is returned and the target regains at least 1 Hit Point.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-477" />
name: Tooth Fairy
